about_the_game:
This is the Soundtrack for Iris.Fall, containing 10 musical tracks. You'll find the file in your Steam directory:


Tracklist：
01 - Iris
02 - Trip
03 - Nightmare
04 - Flower_Cart
05 - Dance in Darkness
06 - Memory Story
07 - Circus
08 - Home
09 - Slide
10 - PuppetShow

Audio Designer: Xin Zhang, Yongzhen Ma
Composer: Edwin Wendler, Thomas Parisch
Music Director: Xin Zhang
Music Producer: Vivita Zheng
Music Production Studio: Unisonar

Special Instrument Designer: Yoon Lee
Special Instrument Technical Designer: Gabriel Bennett

Zither: Thomas Parisch
Percussion/Piano: Thomas Parisch
Reso Violin: Ben Powell
Water Wah: Yoon Lee
Guitar: Yoon Lee
Recording Studio: Unisonar (LA)
Mixer/Mastering: Xin Zhang, Jie Yang
Special Thanks: Zhu Xuguang, Zhang Yingfan
